fxInfo_label: Lower chamber quota for social groups
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: These quotas are sometimes informally known as "minority quotas." Do not record gender quotas here (as gender is not part of what we mean by a social group). Also, do not include special rules that benefit parties defined by social group but do not guarantee seats for these groups. For example, do not count a rule exempting parties from threshold requirements. Code "yes" only if the groups covered by the quota have full voting rights in the legislature.
fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding. The resulting data has not gone through full quality control with thorough cross-referencing yet. V-Dem Country Coordinators answers were used for country-years where data was missing in CCP (Elkins et al. 2012).
fxInfo_question: Is there a national-level quota for any social groups in the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature?

fxInfo_responses.value: No national level quota for any social group.
Yes, there are reserved seats for at least one social group.

fxInfo_sources: CCP (Elkins et al. 2012), v225; Coding by V-Dem country coordinators.
name: v2lgqumin
